title: Corn genetics research exposes mechanism behind traits becoming silent

title_detail.value: Corn genetics research exposes mechanism behind traits becoming silent

summary: For more than a century, plant geneticists have been studying maize as a model system to understand the rules governing the inheritance of traits, and a team of researchers recently unveiled a previously unknown mechanism that triggers gene silencing in corn.
